title: $29+ O/W Airfare Sale

Frontier is celebrating its 21 years in the airline biz this week with a limited-time promotion discounting fall travel. Flights start at $29 each way (shown as $58 round-trip below). Most sale routes must be booked by July 31, though a few routes have a quicker expiry date of July 10 (updated this morning from July 8). 
For the sale routes ending at the end of the month, travel is valid Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Saturdays between August 22 and October 20. For the sale routes ending July 10, travel is valid on varying select dates in late July and throughout August. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
